title: Identify ions X and Y in solution

content.description: Which of the following best identifies ions <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi> </math>?
content.question: <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> A <math alttext="B a with a positive 2 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Ba</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> <math alttext="C l with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Cl</mi><mo>-</mo></msup></math> B <math alttext="C l with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Cl</mi><mo>-</mo></msup></math> <math alttext="S with a negative 2 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> C <math alttext="S with a negative 2 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> <math alttext="N a with a positive 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Na</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math> D <math alttext="B a with a positive 2 charge" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Ba</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> <math alttext="N a with a positive 1 charge " overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>Na</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
